languageKey.label: Recursive tree hide
You cannot hide all subpages of a page unless this flag is set. Be careful - setting this option means that TYPO3 will allow a whole tree of pages to be hidden in one go!

You should also consider the performance issues involved when hiding a large page tree. It might take a considerable amount of time to do that and if PHP times out before the operation is finished the results might be unpredictable.
Cacher d'arborescence recursif

Vous ne pouvez pas masquer les sous-pages d'une page à moins que cette option soit sélectionnée. Soyez prudent - paramétrer cette option signifie que TYPO3 permettra de masquer une arborescence de pages en une seule fois!

You should also consider the performance issues involved when hiding a large page tree. It might take a considerable amount of time to do that and if PHP times out before the operation is finished the results might be unpredictable.
